basic_info.name: AEC Placements
description: Aditya Engineering College has its own placement cell which grooms students as per the industry standards. They hold various sessions in each semester to train them for the real challenges. The most common activities that are conducted to give the required exposure are: Written test - how to attempt a questionnaire provided by the company/ recruiter Personality development - face to face interviews/ group discussions and more Smart ways to tackle different real-time situations/ communications skills and more.

Section.name: About AEC Surampalem
Section.description:
Aditya Engineering College is an autonomous private engineering college situated in eco-friendly area of 180 acres thick greenery environment at Surampalem, Andhra Pradesh. College was established in 2001 with a vision to induce higher plans of learning by impacting technical education with international standards, applied research, creative ability to emerge as the premier institute. College is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU) and college also awarded “ A++ “ grade from NAAC.
AEC provides various courses in UG, PG and Diploma category, requirements of which are stated below:
Undergraduate Courses
Currently, a single undergraduate course with various specialisations is offered by the college. A brief about the same is given below:



Intermediate graduates(10+2) with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics (PCM) as main subjects
Postgraduate Courses
Currently, three courses with various specialisations are offered by the college. A brief about the same is given below


B. Tech or equivalent degree from an AICTE approved institute
Diploma Courses
Currently, a single diploma course with various specialisations is offered by the college. A brief about the same is given below:


Matric or intermediate graduates
Read about AEC Courses & Fee
With the change in time and increasing competition, college main focus is to provide conveniently and modernize facilities to the students. A brief of them mentioned below:
Aditya Engineering College has its own placement cell which grooms students as per the industry standards. They hold various sessions in each semester to train them for the real challenges. The most common activities that are conducted to give the required exposure are: Written test - how to attempt a questionnaire provided by the company/ recruiter Personality development - face to face interviews/ group discussions and more Smart ways to tackle different real-time situations/ communications skills and more.
